abstract: Sen Mark S Kirk of Illinois apologizes to Democratic Rep Tammy Duckworth for seeming to mocking her ethnicity during debate; Duckworth, Iraqi war veteran, is challenging Kirk for his United States Senate seat.

headline.print_headline: Retort on Opponent’s Race Draws Fire and an Apology
headline.main: Kirk’s Retort About Duckworth’s Race at Senate Debate Draws Criticism

snippet: A day after the debate, the senator apologized for saying, “I had forgotten that your parents came all the way from Thailand to serve George Washington.”...
lead_paragraph: A day after the debate, the senator apologized for saying, “I had forgotten that your parents came all the way from Thailand to serve George Washington.”
